lead_paragraph: HEYER--Joseph F.,86, of Monroe Twp., NJ, died July 10, 2016. Visitation: Thursday, July 14, 2-4 and 7-9 at M. David DeMarco Funeral Home, Inc., 205 Rhode Hall Rd., Monroe Twp., NJ 08831. Mass: Friday, July 15 at 10:15am in Immaculate Conception Church, Spotswood, NJ. Burial: Holy Cross Burial Park, East Brunswick, NJ. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HEYER, JOSEPH F.
